## Kupmios.getUnspentOutputsWithAsset() method

Gets unspent outputs containing a specific asset.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getUnspentOutputsWithAsset(address: Address | null, unit: AssetId): Promise<TransactionUnspentOutput[]>;
```
